docs.lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD -- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell's infamous dictum, "You break it, you own it," resonates with Americans. There is an Iraqi variant, particularly prevalent in Sunni Arab areas. You broke it. It's still broken. Fix it.

headline.main: Iraqis Judge America's Seven Years in Their Country

docs.abstract: An occupier that we know is better than a new, different one, says one of many Iraqis that the Baghdad bureau spoke with about the withdrawal of United States forces.
docs.snippet: An occupier that we know is better than a new, different one, says one of many Iraqis that the Baghdad bureau spoke with about the withdrawal of United States forces.

byline.original: By STEPHEN FARRELL and BAGHDAD BUREAU
